attributes.review: i downloaded this app to support the president. it immediately gave my phone a massive virus and my phone crashed. i took my phone to get looked at and they told me that this app is what destroyed my phone. i had just bought a new and expensive phone. so i had to purchase a new phone! DO NOT GET THIS APP.
attributes.title: HORRIBLE APP

attributes.review: I was trying to learn more, educate myself, ya know? Since I'm always on ✨TikTok✨but the app kept on glitching and it would kick me out of it? So I had to reset my phone and next thing I know, my phone has a virus? Oranges are popping up on the screen and I'm very ticked by this. Do not get this app.
attributes.title: m8 this is very horrible

attributes.review: This app has been glitching out and apparently leaking data! It’s a danger to your phone especially with the new IOS. The amount of space it takes is honestly discouraging! How can this be taking 5.3 GB! Get out of here! Don’t use this for News, use a more appropriate app for unbiased news!
attributes.title: This App

attributes.review: I decided to download this app to support my ever so loving president but when I did I started receiving disturbing images of yellow deformed toenails!!! I then starting getting weird text messages from some creeps saying they found me from this app! This app has led me to no longer assist our Cheeto president Donald trump.
attributes.title: Do not download!

attributes.review: where do I even begin.....it took 4 YEARS TO DOWNLOAD 🤬🤬then once the app finally🙄 was ready to use, it SEXUALLY ASSAULTED😱😱😱ME FOR BEING A WOMAN😳😳it tried to ask me out 😩and get my number 📲📲but when I said no 😡🤚🏻it started to cuss me out 🤬🤬and proceeded to DELETE ITSELF😩😳😱 I am truly at a loss for words🤐🤧 do not get this app if you are woman 🥵😤😭🤯😱😝👏🏻👏🏻👏🏻👏🏻!!!!
attributes.title: bothered 😤🤚🏻🤚🏻

attributes.review: This took 4 days to download and once I opened it, it gave my phone some type of virus and started to make my phone lag. Definitely wouldn’t recommend this app. This is probably the worst app I have ever downloaded. If you even think about using this app think again. THIS APP IS TRASH just LIKE OUR PRESIDENT.
attributes.title: WORST APP EVER

attributes.review: I downloaded this app so I could get updates on trumps campaign. It complete reset my phone and I lost EVERYTHING all my family photos and personal documents. I should receive finical compensation for the hardship I have had to go through due to this app deleting everything.
attributes.title: Worst app EVER

attributes.review: I had high hopes for this app. As soon as I downloaded it, it caused my entire phone to crash. I had to get a brand new phone. As if that’s not bad enough. It pooped in my shoes, kidnapped my mom, robbed me, and shaved my dog for another one of it’s toupees. I am very disappointed by this app. Don’t download it....or vote for the Cheeto it’s named after
attributes.title: Worst App Ever

attributes.review: So I got this app to get updated on our beautiful orange president! But out of nowhere the presidents 🍤 appeared on the screen. I had to run and grad some bleach to wash that image out of my head. Just like Trump wanted us to inject ourselves with in the 1st place. Now I would like the trump administration to pay my medics bill for new eyes!!!😓😓😓
attributes.title: This stinks!

attributes.review: I wish I could give this app less than 1 star but sadly I cannot. The app kept crashing and when I finally got it to successfully open ONCE, the content and design was terrible. The app was virtually impossible to navigate!
attributes.title: Terrible!! App kept crashing
